# Fire (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** moderate evocation; **CL** 8th

**Slot** none

**Price** 18,950 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

Crafted from bronzewood with brass bindings, this staff allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Burning Hands (Spell)|Burning hands]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Fireball (Spell)|Fireball]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|Wall of fire]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Burning Hands (Spell)|burning hands]], [[Fireball (Spell)|fireball]], [[Wall of Fire (Spell)|wall of fire]]*

**Cost** 9,475 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 494
